together insert hook in next stitch yarn over and pull up a loop 2 loops on hook insert hook in next stitch yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and draw through all 3 loops on hook fl-single_crochet front loop single_crochet single_crochet in front loop only of indicated stitch bl-single_crochet back loop single_crochet single_crochet in back loop only of indicated stitch stitch pattern worked over an odd number of stitches row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each remaining chain across turn row 2 chain 1 fl-single_crochet in first st *bl-single_crochet in next st fl-single_crochet in next st repeat from * across turn repeat row 2 for stitch pattern note to maintain stitch pattern during garment shaping always work in the front loop of fl-single_crochet sts and in the back loop of bl-single_crochet sts back rolled hem with larger hook chain 44 46 48 50 row 1 slip st in second chain from hook and in each remaining chain across turn 43 45 47 49 sts row 2 7 chain 1 working in back loops only slip st in each st across turn fold piece lengthwise bringing row 1 up to align with sts of row 7 row 8 chain 1 working through both thicknesses *insert hook in unused loop of next st of row 1 and in the front loop of next st of row 7 yarn over and draw through all loops on hook making a slip st repeat from * across turn change to smaller hook tighten loop on
